meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a pygmy.
meanings.sent1: The pygmaean tree was so small it could fit in the palm of my hand.
meanings.sent2: The tiny house had a pygmaean door that even children had to stoop to enter.
meanings.sent3: The pygmaean kitten tried to climb the giant oak tree but only made it a few inches up.
meanings.sent4: Her pygmaean voice was barely audible over the loud music.
meanings.sent5: The pygmaean mushrooms in the forest looked like miniature umbrellas.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the ancient Pygmy people of Greek mythology.
meanings.sent1: The pygmaean artifacts found in the ruins shed light on the ancient Pygmy civilization.
meanings.sent2: Legends say the pygmaean warriors were fierce and skilled in battle.
meanings.sent3: The pygmaean dancers entertained the crowd with their graceful movements.
meanings.sent4: His pygmaean stature belied his strength and agility.
meanings.sent5: The pygmaean masks worn during the festival were intricately carved.
